body_html: We're looking into adding NUMA support to TF via extending the platform interface, rather than adopting a library that isn't universally supported. The contemplated functionality is a subset of that provided by libnuma. I'll update this thread when there's something definitive.
body_text: We're looking into adding NUMA support to TF via extending the platform interface, rather than adopting a library that isn't universally supported.  The contemplated functionality is a subset of that provided by libnuma.  I'll update this thread when there's something definitive.
